title: Mohammed Y. Omer,DVM
text:
Is there is a problem with app?
I can‚Äôt change my work status!

title: The scammer to legit ratio is 70/30
text: Require a better background check on these companies looking for hire, put them through an ID.Me or something..

title: Account Restricted Again for Accepting Connections
text: My account is restricted AGAIN for accepting new connections AND THIS IS GETTING OLD. It then takes DAYS to gain access MY ACCOUNT again because the ‚Äúverifier‚Äù is overseas?

title: I‚Äôve restarted and redownloaded this app so many times
text: Every time I restart and re-download this app, I will get notifications and within a day or two it will stop giving me notifications and the page turns blank.

title: Wishlist
text:
1). Swipe left like every where else in iOS to go back. I may read an article in LinkedIn but then can‚Äôt get back to the discovery page? 

2). Dark mode

Otherwise really have been enjoying the app still learning a lot how to maximize it

title: OPT OUT of Recruiter View and suggestions
text: Just got a notification about my ‚ÄúRecruiter View‚Äù. How do I opt out of that. Not everyone on LinkedIn is looking for a job. Also, let us opt out of suggested contacts and posts by strangers. If you really want us to have ‚Äúthe best experience‚Äù, don‚Äôt assume we are looking for a job or want unsolicited suggestions.

title: Why can‚Äôt I join premium again?
text: The mobile app won‚Äôt let me join premium and customer support can‚Äôt help, they say it Apples fault. ?????

title: Feature
text: Could you add a feature/button that links the Linkedin Profile URL? Alot of job apps are starting to leave a space for that particular URL.

title: So many scammers
text: The amount of scammers that are on LinkedIn in is concerning. The company (from what I‚Äôve seen) does not try to precedent scammers from getting on their app. Scammers are evolving. Telling your customers what to look for is no longer enough. As a company, you all need to put resources into coming up with strategies to prevent scammers from using your app. It‚Äôs not just up to your customer to weed out scammers on a service you provide. People who use these apps are looking for employment and to charger for a premium service is a bit odd. We are trying to find employment to make money. Not spend money to hopefully get employment. It‚Äôs becoming very disappointing with all of the hiring apps.

title: Corporate hellscape
text: I open linked in as rarely as humanly possible.
